# Parameters table

## Population characteristics

|Variable             |Distribution                                                             |
|---------------------|-------------------------------------------------------------------------|
|Work Schedule        |$Multinom \sim (X_{morning} = 0.4, X_{Afternoon} = 0.4, X_{Night} = 0.2)$|
|Staff type           |$Multinom \sim (X_{CN} = 0.6, X_{RN} = 0.15, X_{LPN} = 0.15)$            |
|CN contacts per hour |$Multinom \sim (X_0 = 0.7, X_1 = 0.3)$                                   |
|RN contacts per hour |$Multinom \sim (X_0 = 0.25, X_1 = 0.75)$                                 |
|LPN contacts per hour|$Multinom \sim (X_0 = 0.15, X_2 = 0.2, X_3 = 0.25, X_4 = 0.2, X_5 = 0.2)$|

## Infection

| Name                                                         | Value            | Reference|
|--------------------------------------------------------------|------------------|----------|
| Latent period ($\alpha$)                                     | $Lognormal(7, 3)$| [@He2020]$^{b,c}$|
| Asymptomatic ($f$)                                           | $0.25$           |          |
| Average recovery time ($\gamma_1$)                           | $15 days$        |          |
| Proportion of Hospitalizations ($\sigma_1$)                  | $0.23$           |          |
|Median number of days from symptom onset to hosp ($\gamma_2$) | $4(1,9)$         |          |
|Median number of days of hosp for ICU admision ($\gamma_3$)   | $6(3,10)$        |          |
|Median number of days of hosp for non ICU admision ($\gamma_3$)| $12(6,20)$      |          |
|Percentage of deaths on hospitalization ($\sigma_2$)          | $11.8%$          |          |
| Shedding probability ()                                      | $0.41$           |          |
| Infection probability ()                                     | $0.41$           |          |
| Introduction probability ($\omega$)                          | $0.1$            |          |
